title: Are You Okay?
description: Are You Okay? is a sweet story about the spirit of helping others. Students will enjoy seeing how the animal characters assist each other with familiar tasks around school. The story supports readers by providing colorful illustrations, high-frequency words, and some repetitive text. The book can be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and the proper use of quotation marks.
reviewWords: fell, help, hook, hung, okay, recess
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Determine cause and effect
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /e/ sound
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word was
